sections.text: Effective:September 26, 1996Latest Legislation:House Bill 356 - 121st General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in this chapter:(A) "Coal research and development" means inquiry, experimentation, or demonstration to advance basic scientific or
